    • Method Detail

      • ensureCapacity

        private void ensureCapacity(int minCapacity)
        Ensures the internal array has enough capacity. If the required capacity exceeds the current size, the array will grow (usually doubled).

        Specified by:
        iterator in interface ListADT<E>
